music.title: Netherworld
music.description: A proud, unapologetic plunge into hedonistic self-destruction and forbidden pleasure. The Dark Emperor willingly surrenders to the Netherworld ‚Äî a seductive realm of depravity, intense ecstasy, and moral abandon. Defiant pride, addictive nectar, tingling sensations, and ceremonial devotion. Sane life is boring. Total submission: ‚ÄúWilling victim I‚Äôve become.‚Äù
music.lyrics:
I'm The Dark Emperor Shak naka
Don't tell me this Don't tell me that
I know the truth I'm closer to my doom

Netherworld is calling To it I am walking
This pleasure I feel I won't let it go

Nectar I suck from this nether regionüí¶
Next to twin tower I'll take dominion
Kitty face is smiling üòª It is mesmerising
This pleasure we feel, we won't let it go

Tingling sensations, happy mood is on,
Defend it I will, sanity is gone
Normal life is boring
But the devil is cunning üëπ
Actions I am, my words I'll be

Netherworld 11x
Willing victim I've become
